name: World of Subways 1 â€“ The Path
description: The World of Subways 1 line is going from New York beneath the Hudson-River to Newark. The original route is almost equally split in underground and above ground sections. Coming with excellent graphics this simulator also puts a lot of emphasis on original physics of the train and wagons.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7/8 Processor: Dual Core, 2.6 GHz or faster Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: with at least 512 MB of VRAM Storage: 3 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7/8 Processor: Dual Core, 2.6 GHz or faster Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: with 2 GB of on-board, dedicated VRAM Storage: 3 GB available space
